Veruti:
There are so many strange things about the Material Realm. Apparently we need Adena just to get some clothes!
So I've asked Zephyra to help me create items of value so that the Ertheia can make some Adena. The research was very hard, but it was worth it!
How about it? Shall we embark on researching the mysterious together? Just remember, only Ertheia Lv. 40 or above who have completed 1st Liberation can learn this skill.
